bgDescription: While many may turn up their noses at General Jiyan's cooking, the Midnight Rangers, a group of experienced soldiers, savor each bite. The stew is brimming with hearty vegetables and sparing on meat, a reminder of their past battles on the frontlines. Its familiar flavors evoke a sense of nostalgia for their time as warriors, making it a treasured dish among these old soldiers.
description: Increases all teammates' ATK by 10% and Crit. Rate by 8%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases all teammates' ATK by 10% and Crit. Rate by 8%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
